column2: Hello there, I’m the all-mighty hive mind.
Let’s start with something simple. Try to infect these poor, defenseless elders.
You should be able to do this pretty easily, I hope.
These children are annoying, get them all.
Don’t tell me you’re getting soft.
They actually move faster and harder to get infected. So be wise
See the garbage bin? You can use them wisely.
They are not human, but they can be touched to spread spores
